name: BadEngine Demo
description:
Got bored and decided to make a game engine from scratch. Went for 2D because it seemed easier. This is an incredibly short, half-assed game, with the main intention of testing the engine.

This works on Windows and Windows only. I do not plan to get it working on other platforms.

Note: This currently has a catastrophic memory leak. I think I may have fixed it, but I'm not sure.

Sound effects from https://freesfx.co.uk.
